title: where is play button
body: the play button is not in my game launcher

replies.body:
I just got my account and I have the same problem can anyone help us figure it out

....maybe the download thing in top left is a update and gives us back the button
i also do not see the play button ..but my league auncher is still  downloading something in the top left corner of my client ...maybe thats where it is?
i have the same problem excalty the same
yep its behind the downloading thing

I'd like to help with this but need more details.  Can you provide a screenshot of the issue you're having?  The patcher should have a Launch button.  The Play button is not available until after you log in.  Let me know!
